resources.string: please, enter days quantity for budget!
This is a very simple, convenient and effective application to control your expenses. With this app, it\'s easy to see if you\'re out of your budget!
Just enter the amount of your budget and days quantity.
All you need to do is just add every your expense.
This application will show you your cost statistics during the day and in general for each day in your budget period.
In addition, the application will show you how much it is recommended to spend in one day.
- Press the button New Budget on Start Screen.\n- Enter the amount of money and the number of days for which the budget should be calculated.\n- Press Ok.
Why Daily Expenses Screen is Empty?
This window displays the expenses for each day. The amount of expenses for the current day will appear at the beginning of the next day.
The application is absolutely free! The ads placed in such a way that it does not interfere with the comfortable use of the application.
How to use the plus/minus buttons?
Press the \"-\" button if you want to add expenses.
Press the \"+\" button if you want to increase your current amount.
